Awards of the Israeli Film Academy - WON - Best Picture
Jerusalem Film Festival - WON - Best Actress

Aviva is a poor cook at a local Tiberias hotel whose big dream is about to come true. Aviva has remarkable writing abilities and through her sister, Anita, she meets Oded, a famous writer who promises he'll make Aviva a great writer as well. But Aviva's big break starts to affect her family, and not necessarily in a good way. Aviva's future begins to alternate between despair and hope.
